price: (56) He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"
arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla waman yaqnaṭu min raḥmati rabbihi illā al-ḍālūna
